testsuite.name: Scenario: Delete the improvised test record

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Delete the improvised test record

testcase.name: When I open the Search User page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Delete the improvised test record

testcase.name: Then I check if user "sam" exists, if not, I create the user
testcase.classname: Scenario: Delete the improvised test record

testcase.name: When I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Delete the improvised test record

testcase.name: Then I am on the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Delete the improvised test record

testcase.name: When I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Delete the improvised test record

testcase.name: When I navigate to the "Class Grades" in "Gradebook" of current class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Delete the improvised test record

testcase.name: Then I am on the Class Grades page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Delete the improvised test record

testcase.name: When I select "Improvised A1 - Homework/Quiz" in "Assignments" selection list
testcase.classname: Scenario: Delete the improvised test record

testcase.name: And I put "sam" in the "User" input box
testcase.classname: Scenario: Delete the improvised test record

testcase.name: And I click the Search button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Delete the improvised test record

testcase.name: When I click the grade for the selected assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Delete the improvised test record

testcase.name: Then I see the test record details of "Improvised A1" for user "sam"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Delete the improvised test record

testcase.name: When I click the Delete Record button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Delete the improvised test record

testcase.name: Then I am on the Class Grades page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Delete the improvised test record

testcase.name: And I assert that the grade is "-" for the selected assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Delete the improvised test record

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Delete the improvised test record

testsuite.system-out: # MO-2205 Scenario: Empty grades should not be clickable for external assignments ?[90m# gradebook/ManageImprovisedTestRecords.feature:137?[0m # Navigate to the External & Rubrics page of the Demonstration Class ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI am on "Class Homepage" page of "?[0m?[32m?[1mDemonstration Class?[0m?[32m" class?[0m ?[90m# ClassHomepageSteps.navigateToClassHomepage(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI navigate to the "?[0m?[32m?[1mExternal & Rubrics?[0m?[32m" in "?[0m?[32m?[1mExternal?[0m?[32m" of current class?[0m ?[90m# ClassHomepageSteps.navigateInClass(String,String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI am on the External & Rubrics page?[0m ?[90m# ExternalAndRubricsSteps.waitForExternalAndRubricsPage()?[0m # Create an external assignment ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI put "?[0m?[32m?[1mExternal Assignment 1?[0m?[32m" in the "Assignment Name" input box?[0m ?[90m# ExternalAndRubricsSteps.inputAssignmentName(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI click the Save button?[0m ?[90m# ExternalAndRubricsSteps.clickSave()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI assert that the message "?[0m?[32m?[1mExternal Assignment was saved successfully.?[0m?[32m" appears?[0m ?[90m# ExternalAndRubricsSteps.assertMessage(String)?[0m # Navigate to the Gradebook Class Grades page ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI navigate to the "?[0m?[32m?[1mClass Grades?[0m?[32m" in "?[0m?[32m?[1mGradebook?[0m?[32m" of current class?[0m ?[90m# ClassHomepageSteps.navigateInClass(String,String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI am on the Class Grades page?[0m ?[90m# GradebookClassGradesSteps.waitForClassGradesPage()?[0m # Search grades for the new student and assignment ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI select "?[0m?[32m?[1mExternal Assignment 1 - External?[0m?[32m" in "Assignments" selection list?[0m ?[90m# GradebookClassGradesSteps.selectAssignment(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI put "?[0m?[32m?[1msam?[0m?[32m" in the "User" input box?[0m ?[90m# GradebookClassGradesSteps.inputUserLogin(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI click the Search button?[0m ?[90m# GradebookClassGradesSteps.clickSearch()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI assert that the grade is "?[0m?[32m?[1m-?[0m?[32m" for the selected assignment?[0m ?[90m# GradebookClassGradesSteps.assertTotalGrade(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI assert that the grade is not clickable for the selected assignment?[0m ?[90m# GradebookClassGradesSteps.assertAssignmentGradeIsNotClickable()?[0m
